content: Shopping Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 May 2019What is Quandoo, how can I get discounts using them?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Cindy Junovica, Community Manager at ShopbackLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 23 May 2019Hello! Cindy's here, Community Manager of ShopBack.It's a reservation app for booking tables at restaurants. You can get Quandoo points for each reservation fulfilled, exchangeable for cash!
On top of that, you can earn $4 Cashback by making reservation via ShopBack. 1.) Visit www.shopback.sg or Launch ShopBack App first (Sign Up/ Log In to your SB account)2.) Search for Quandoo3.) You will be redirected to Quandoo's web! Make reservation as usual.
So you can save $ while eating out; sometimes eat practically for free (when you collect a lot of points)0 comments3
